name: rise_of_the_eldrazi
description: A very large package capturing Rise of the Eldrazi mechanics: Eldrazi titans, Annihilator, Eldrazi Spawn, Level up, Rebound, Totem armor (Umbras), Defender-matters, colorless-matters, big-mana battlecruiser effects.

Creature: Vigilance
Lifelink

When {THIS} enters the battlefield, create {N} 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."
Creatures you control with defender can attack as though they didn't have defender.
Whenever another creature you control attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Whenever you cast a colorless spell, you gain {N} life.

Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)
